content: needle it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 snowflake cast on 6 stitches using long tail cast on distribute between 3 needles 2 stitches per needle and join to knit in the round round 1 knit into the front leg of the stitch then slip the back leg of the stitch w/o knitting repeat 5 more times = 12 stitches total round 2 knit all stitches 12 stitches round 3 k1 yo2 repeat 11 more times 36 stitches round 4 k1 knit the 1st yarn over purl the 2nd yarn over repeat 11 more times 36 stitches round 5 knit all stitches 36 stitches note before proceeding transfer all stitches to a circular needle or a piece of scrap yarn round 6 binding off and shaping the points if using scrap yarn place the first 7 stitches back onto your needle if using a circular needle move the first 7 stitches towards the tip of your left-hand needle begin working the following sequence a tree point knitting into the first stitch on lh needle kco10 bo6 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco6 bo5 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco5 bo4 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco5 bo5 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco4 bo5 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 kco5 bo6 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco6 bo13 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle a clock-hand point knitting into the stitch on lh needle kco4 chain 8 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle kco7 next without turning your work k 6 turn your work sl 1 p 5 turn your work k 5 turn your work sl 1 p 4 turn your work bobble 7 slip the last stitch from rh needle back to lh needle now knitting into the stitch on lh needle chain 8 slip the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle bo8 end of sequence transfer the next 6 stitches from scrap yarn onto a needle or slide the next 6 stitches towards the tip of your circular needle now slip the last stitch from rh needle onto your lh needle = 7 sts total on lh needle work the sequence 5 more times nb only 6 stitches will be left on your needle for the final sequence important at the end of the last sequence bobble 7 instead of 8 only 1 stitch left on your rh needle next insert the needle into the 1st stitch of the round and pull a new stitch through now slip the stitch from rh needle over it break yarn secure and weave in the ends it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 stiffen and block out your snowflake
